title: U.S. passenger-miles : Intercity/Amtrak 2007 to 2018
summary: Overall U.S. passenger-miles in millions has decreased over the Year.
U.S. passenger-miles in millions is slightly increasing from 2011 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest U.S. passenger-miles in millions, of value 7283.0 was reached at Year 2013
The lowest U.S. passenger-miles in millions, of value 6361.0 was reported at Year 2018
